item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Commander Nitin Manocha, an accomplished military leader with 14 years of experience in the Indian Navy. Currently, I am transitioning to the corporate sector and working as an Associate Director â€“ Quality Assurance at KAMS Global Bahrain. I hold multiple degrees, including an MBA and an M.Tech in Aerospace Engineering from IISc Bangalore. My expertise spans strategic operations, aviation safety, quality assurance, and digital transformation. I am also actively pursuing a Ph.D. and exploring opportunities in academia and research.
